Html:
Hi
The MVVM toolkit seems very cool. my question however is how to use it in an N-Tier (multi-project) design?
OR can we use this with Entity Framework ?

Sure.  This toolkit is a presentation pattern which doesn't restrict the business or data layers but compliments them through a separation of concerns.  The entity framework is basically your model.  It doesn't have to reside in the same dll as the presentation code.  Is there anything in particular that makes you feel like this pattern is unable to work well with an n-tier design?
